New Records: Jordan Poole topped 25 points for a fifth straight game, the first such stretch of his career.
Key Match Events: Jordan Poole scored 30 points and made six 3-pointers.
Rookie Alex Sarr added 11 points and 10 rebounds.
Zach LaVine scored 32 points for the Bulls.
Coby White added 17 points for the Bulls.
Nikola Vucevic had 12 points and 13 rebounds for the Bulls.
Washington sealed the outcome with a 7-0 run early in the fourth quarter, building a 20-point lead.
Rookie Kyshawn George hit a 3-pointer and completed a steal and dunk during the 7-0 run.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Wizards' win was their largest of the season.
The Bulls committed 20 turnovers and trailed throughout the final three quarters.
The Bulls missed a crucial opportunity to pull within two games of .500.
The Wizards are still last in the Eastern Conference but have been playing more competitive basketball, especially at home.
